channel.title: ~~RELEASE~~----- Xell scape 317 EPIC MY FIRST SOURCE new poll for v2
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Xell scape is out =D[/size]
also if you flame me it will be removed for good its my first time coding dont flame
please note that this client isnt mine in any way i did not edit it or do anything to it so 100% client creds to xx weed xx
[b]Download :
Source: http://www.mediafire.com/?c5j1c62chkzef8l Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?5obktr0bk9bcb23[/b]
[size=36pt]CREDITZ[/size]
[ul][li]xx weed xx [/li] [li]moparscape tuts [/li] [li]my friend who got me into rsps [/li] [li]me for editing and adding stuff [/li][/ul]
please take a sec to comment on how i did im not shure
first of all im useing xx weed xx's evolutionX for the base as i find its easy for me. (its delta sorry people)
Hey everyone this is my first ever project im making here im toatally new to coding so yeh please dont flame as this is my first time ever coding.
[size=24pt]~~FeAtUrEs~~[/size] 100% pvp armor 100% D claws 100% Barrage 100% veng 99.9% veng other (dont have the real emote thts y) 100%jail and fixed unjail 100%gs specials and sara sword 100% barrows and it breaks staff zone event zone for dpartys ect. Not corp but chaos elemenal that drops pvp gear fixed home to make it look realer than it was 7 wave jad 60 is way to much donater zone yelling ranks (example) [donater] zezima: im a girl another example [player] 1 hit k0: omfg its zezima lets rape the pixels god wars FULL KBD drops Dclaws ect slayer tower kill dark demons for d bow and abby demons for abby whip new shops ect. Green dragons And much more go here to download the source + client and find out what it is like
[size=24pt]~~COMMAND LIST~~[/size] ::hail ::mute ::master ::ipban ::pure ::banuser ::jail ::Event ::unjail ::staffHQ ::chaos ::mute ::ipmute and much much much more that i cant remeber download the server and have a look for your self
--Pics-- Anyways here is a pic of the home that i have made so far anyways i know its edge but i cant come up with anything else. I will be updating stuff everytime i move around stuff and there will be lots more pictures comming.
HOME 100% done v2 will be way way better and looking more realer than this. [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/ss.jpg[/img]
Pvp armor and weps + claws and real rs whip model [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/000-4.jpg[/img]
100% VENGANCE 99.9% VENG OTHER [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/00-6.jpg[/img]
100% JAIL AND UNJAIL [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/44.jpg[/img]
100% gs stance and specials ( i only added zamorak special sara special and ags special) [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/sws.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/0000000-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/0000-2.jpg[/img]
Event zone location ( in progress ) [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/00000-4.jpg[/img]
staff zone ( in progress to also may change locaton) [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/00000000-1.jpg[/img]
ASSAULT MINIGAME KILL GUARDS TO GET POINTS TO SPEND ON TORSO ECT.(not mine) (origional) [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/bbb.jpg[/img]
100% fight pits (i just edited a bit if you wil u get a prize [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/aa.jpg[/img]
Pest controle fully working i just added like 3 things to it to make it better [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/dd.jpg[/img] THE TIMES ECT I EDITED A BIT [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/untitled.jpg[/img] and of course the void whitch you can buy once u get enough points [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/z.jpg[/img] Barrows [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/pp.jpg[/img]
Chaos boss (drops pvp weps /armor) [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/Copyofs.jpg[/img]
Slayer tower abby demons and dark beasts [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/ssss.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i896.photobucket.com/albums/ac162/okmnhy8/sss.jpg[/img]
----READ THIS---- [size=14pt]THIS IS NOT THE SOURCE BUT HAS ALL THE SAME STUFF THAT I HAD IN MY SOURCE ITS THE BASE, I DIDNT HAVE MY SOURCE BUT IM WORKING ON V2 THIS IS OCEANX V3 AND NI TAKE NO CREDITS FOR THIS BUT IT IS ALMOST THE SAME AS MINE JUST A FEW DIFFERENT THINGS[/size] [b]Source: http://www.mediafire.com/?c5j1c62chkzef8l Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?5obktr0bk9bcb23[/b]
